summary:
My first mod.. i hope you enjoy this mod :)
No Requirement Version has been release, enjoy :D
descriptionHtml:
Ashe
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/28984-1-1357052958.png[/img]

First==:>
Two new version has been released, V1.1a and V1.1b
v1.1a version: No require version of the mod
v1.1b version: best For you if you already have univision face

[line]
Second==:>
Big thank to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1956705/] lowegule [/url] for the match mod combinations ;D ,and also thank for the face/body mod makers. 
About the pic> dont see the [color=yellow] THUMBNAILS [/color] , see the [color=green] PICS [/color] instead ;D (click it)

[line]
Descripton==:>
Add a new pretty and stylish girl as your follower. She good At one handed weapon, essential (cannot be killed), and marriageable.
She is in Bannered mare in whiterun.

[line]
Recomandation 1==:> This is some mods to make my mod look better (just a little i think)

1, [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709] DIMONIZED UNP female body [/url] replace with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14899] UNP BLESSED BODY UNPB - With Optional BBP Breast Physics [/url] ( i use the UNPB-BBP v2-2 standard Pack Fixed, i dont know what happen if you use the other version)

2, [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12951] Enhanced Character Edit [/url]

3, [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14569] univision Face  [/url]

4, [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19666] Fair Skin Complexion [/url] use the \"Fair_skin_complexion_for_UNP_UNPB_UNPC_v4_1_Shaved\" download the opptional file too \'FSC_for_UNP_v2_Moderate_univision_patch\"

5, [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20530] UNP Delicate [/url]

[line]
Recomendation 2==:>
Armor [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7010] Seraphim Armour Skyrim Edition [/url] (Standalone ver) like in the pics
Other Follower [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28335] Lia the Cute Follower [/url] (respect for Lowegule)
UFO skyrim [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037] UFO - Ultimate Follower Overhaul [/url]

[line]
Credits==:>
Thanks to
1. ApachiiSkyHair : [Url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/283148] apachii [/url]
2. DIMONIZED UNP female body : [Url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/537675] Dimon99 [/url]
3. UNP BLESSED BODY UNPB - With Optional BBP Breast Physics : [Url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1006539] calyps [/url]
4. Enhanced Character Edit : [Url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3841389] tktk1 [/url]
5. Univision face : [Url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3379439] dd2501 [/url]
6. Fair Skin Complexion and UNP Delicate : [Url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/4557236] HHaleyy [/url]

[line]
Finally==:>
If you want edit this mod and reupload em, please credit me ok?
author: AceCypher
